Article.title: Article
Article.description: An article about activity that is being carried through in the realm of OER.

Action.title: Action
Action.description: An action / project that is being carried through in the realm of OER.

additionalType.description: An additonal type for the Action

agent.description: The direct performer or driver of the action (i.e. also primary contact)

participant.description: Other co-agents that participated in the action

memberOf.description: An organization the project is member of.

mentionedIn.description: An article that mentions the project.

isPartOf.description: A project that this project is part of

organizerFor.description: An event the project is organizer for.

Service.title: Service
Service.description: A service used in an Action.

provider.description: The person or organization responsible for provision of the service.

mentionedIn.description: An article that mentions the service.

instrumentIn.description: A project that has the service as an instrument.

resultOf.description: A project that has the service as its result.

memberOf.description: An organization the service is member of.

isRelatedTo.description: Tools used to implement this service

Person.title: Person
Person.description: A person serving or working with Open Educational Resources.

affiliation.description: An organization or service the person is affiliated with.

mentionedIn.description: An article that mentions the person.

organizerFor.description: An event the person is organizer for.

Organization.title: Organization
Organization.description: An institution serving or working with Open Educational Resources.

location.description: The organization's address and geo data

additionalType.description: An additional type for the Organization

memberOf.description: An organization or service the organization is member of.

mentionedIn.description: An article that mentions the organization.

organizerFor.description: An event the organization is organizer for.

Event.title: Event
Event.description: An event that is being held for/by members of the OER community.

performer.description: People presenting, leading a workshop etc. at the event

mentionedIn.description: An article that mentions the event.

Product.title: Tool
Product.description: A tool used to implement OER services

Grant.title: Grant
Grant.description: A grant awarded to a project

isAwardedBy.description: An organization the grant is awarded by.

mentionedIn.description: An article that mentions the grant.

Place.title: Place
Place.description: An location description consisting of an address and/or geo data

Country.title: Country
Country.description: A country, represented by its ISO country code
